Package wjhk.jupload2.policies

Interface Summary
UploadPolicy This interface contains all methods that should be given by any UploadPolicy.
 

Class Summary
CoppermineUploadPolicy Specific UploadPolicy for the coppermine picture gallery.
CustomizedNbFilesPerRequestUploadPolicy These is a simple specialization of DefaultUploadPolicy: the constructor allows to set a maximum number of file per upload.
DefaultUploadPolicy This class implements all UploadPolicy methods.
FileByFileUploadPolicy Specialization of DefaultUploadPolicy, where each upload HTTP request contains only one file.
PictureUploadPolicy This class add handling of pictures to upload.
UploadPolicyFactory This class is used to control creation of the uploadPolicy instance, according to applet parameters (or System properties).
